About Me

I am a self-taught web developer with interest for creating awesome looking web-based applications. As a CS student, I have been carefully currating my knowledge a software development, with exposure to several languages and algorithms. I also have a background in business management and a love for learning new things.

More About me

Currently employed as a planogram analyst, while improving my software development skill through my personal and group projects. I am open to oppotunities, please get in touch if you are interested in working with me, or if you have any questions.
